title: Beyond the Horror: Asylum Episode 7
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: I like how this video is a second longer than your surprise live stream.

Shachath, for having so little screen time is an amazingly powerful character. She only has plot significance for episode 7 really,  but that's all she needs. A truly beautiful character, enigmatic and alluring. She empathizes with humans regardless of their past deeds and offers a peaceful and dignified end. I squee my pants whenever she appears. I hope one day in another season we see her again. Also, the relationship and origins of both Shachath and Satan remain shrouded, being stated more as a matter of fact. I really appreciated that. Not everything supernatural needs an explanation.
Wish I was there but I was sleeping :(
description:
VIDEO CONTAINS SPOILERS FOR ASYLUM/AMERICAN HORROR STORY!!!

Beyond the Horror: Asylum, is an unofficial American Horror Story Live Review Show. Hosted by MaryGirl Moody, Maisie Andrews, Casey Soper, and Tami Sifford. We discuss and review each episode of American Horror Story Asylum. Join the Freaks of AHS on Facebook and Beyond the Horror on FB.

Please send character names for contest to Casey www.facebook.com/caseythehuman or DM us on Instagram: FreaksofAHS
